text: Manolis "Manos" Zacharakis (; born 10 August 1992) is a Greek professional footballer who last played as a defender, for AE Larissa in the Greek Football League. == Career == Zacharakis started his career from the youth teams of OFI Crete. On 1 July 2010 he signed a professional contract and moved to the first squad where he managed to play for almost 3 years. On 18 June 2013 he moved to Super League club Panionios. On 31 January 2015 he signed a 2,5 years contract with AE Larissa. Zacharakis played for Greece National U-21 team, in a friendly game against Austria in 14 November 2012 in Argos. ==References== ==External links== * onsports.gr * myplayer.gr Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:People from Chania Category:Greek footballers Category:Greece under-21 international footballers Category:AE Larissa FC players Category:Panionios F.C. players Category:OFI Crete F.C. players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Manos Zacharakis
